Name: DYNAMIC
About the game: DYNAMIC at its core is a third person action platformer. Test your hand-ball skills against impossible odds & intricate obstacles where every dimension counts. You can play up to 100+ levels in single player & 12 different multiplayer game modes which include: Spaceball -Arcade handball: Team with most goals at the end of the match wins, the hoop has two goals, top one is worth 3pts & and the bottom is worth 1pt. Breakball -Klashball re-imagined: Every ball destroyed determines the amount of points scored, most goals at the end of the match wins. Maya -Arcade Mayan Pitz: The hoops are on the side of walls, most goals at the end of the match wins. Party Ball -Smaller map with each teams post right next to eachother. Motion -4D handball: A moving cube that serves as each teams goal post, within a smaller cubed shaped map. Blockbuster -Blocks & Goals: Each team has to mine a block in order to score. Wallball -Arcade Wall Ball: Whenever a wall gets hit a point is added to the relative team, take back points by wall running on your teams wall. Rugby - Arcade Rugby: hail-mary passes, dodge being chucked and slide for a touch down. Most goals at the end of the match wins. Randomizer -Slot Machine : Press a button and a random light will appear on the goal able to be scored on, each post is worth a different amount of pts. Volleyball -Arcade Volleyball : Wall seperates both teams, aim for the pads on the floor to score. First to 54 pts wins, or team with most points at the end of match wins. Dodgeball -Arcade Dodgeball: Wall separates both teams, chuck the ball at your opponent to score. Futbol -Arcade Soccer: Fast paced soccer, most goals at the end of the match wins.
